title: Twinkle (ft. Namii)
lyrics: Oh I've come such a long long way
And I've watched the world led astray
Walk on through the night
Live a little
I reach for a kindness
anywhere I can see
where do I begin
In a world so fickle
No magic could save me now
Accept the world for what it is
But live a life in ambition
With a twinkle in my eye
A march on through the winter
/ Maybe I'm sinister like I was
// The world can forgive you my dear
/ Equestria's eyes are turned on me for good
/ The world would be better without me
// Please don't say that, you mean more than you could ever think
// You've tried your best, and I've tried mine, listen to what's in your heart
/ I've done so many terrible things, it's hard to imagine that I could fly
/ Hard to imagine a world where I could reply
where do I begin
In a world so fickle
No magic could save me now
Accept the world for what it is
But live a life in ambition
With a twinkle in my eye
A march on through the winter
